name: A-Star Theft Demo 5
description:
A-Star Theft allows the player to execute heists in any way they want. There is the silent approach, and the violent approach. Each with specialized equipment, strategies and different opportunities.

This version introduces the new Story Mode, and includes the first 7 missions of Logan Huntborn's path to freedom. This demo also includes new equipment, better graphics, improved gunplay, audio and interactions.
